Statements :
1. Some cars are bikes
2. Some bikes are pens
3. All laptops are bikes
Conclusions :
I. All laptops are pens
II. Some laptops are cars
III. Some cars are pens
IV. Some laptops are not cars
ENGLISH.OPT2: Only either II or IV follows
